text: varu (prajalu) tama koraku edi dharma sam'matam (halal) ani ninnu adugu tunnaru. Nivu ila anu: "Parisud'dha vastuvulanni mi koraku dharmasam'matam (halal) ceyabaddayi. Mariyu miku allah nerpina vidhanga miru veta siksana iccina jantuvulu mi koraku pattinavi kuda! Kavuna avi mi koraku pattukunna vatini miru tinandi kani danipai allah perunu uccharincandi. Allah yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi. Niscayanga, allah lekka tisukovatanlo ati sighrudu
